name: @wemake.cx/structured-argumentation
description: MCP server for diagrammatic thinking and spatial representation
author: heyFlorentin

scripts.build: bun build --entrypoints ./index.ts --outdir ./dist --format esm --target=bun --sourcemap && (if ! head -1 dist/index.js | grep -q '^#!'; then echo '#!/usr/bin/env bun' | cat - dist/index.js > dist/index.tmp && mv dist/index.tmp dist/index.js; fi) && chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.prepare: bun run types && bun run build
